articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Moderna Covid vaccine highly effective 5 months after second dose: Study - Deccan Herald
articles.description: The Moderna Covid-19 vaccine offers an effectiveness of 87 per cent in preventing infection, over 95 per cent against severe disease, and 98 per cent against death, according to a study. The research, published in The Lancet Regional Health - Americas journal…
articles.content:

articles.title: US plans tougher testing, quarantine requirements for travellers - Eyewitness News
